head.title: Tri-County Area School District | Home of the Penguins | Plainfield, WI

div.h2: Grab and Go Lunches Tuesday and Friday, 10-12

div.div: TC Meals 4 Kids are available on Tuesdays and Friday for this week. If you are on a bus route it will be dropped off at your home (Hancock and Plainfield). Please place a tote or have someone available to meet the bus. The time for drop-offs is 10:15-12. If you live in the Village of Plainfield please pick up at the main entrance of the school between 10:30 -12:00.

div.div: Use of arrow keys when focused on the Google language option field will translate site content on the fly. Use your enter key to review all options and choose your selection before applying.

span.span: Committed to cultivating a trusting environment where each student is inspired for life today and tomorrow.
All students will pursue opportunities to recognize and fulfill their potential.
